summary: A new biological chemical weapon that explodes up to temperatures over fifty degrees Fahrenheit, falls into the hands of two men who try to make sure that it doesn't get stolen by a terrorist.
cast: Cuba Gooding Jr.|Skeet Ulrich|Peter Firth|David Paymer|Hudson Leick|Daniel Hugh Kelly|Kevin J. O'Connor|Judson Mills|Jordan Mott|Darcas Macopson|Jim Grimshaw|Richard Todd Aguayo|K. Addison Young|James Van Harper|Tommy Smeltzer|Geoff Palmer|Rhoda Griffis|Johnny Cenicola|Larry Black|David 'Shark' Fralick|Garrett Warren|Ron Clinton Smith|Stephen Jared|Quint Von Canon|Bart Hansard|Howard Carroll|Lonnie R. Smith Jr.|Johnell Gainey|Martin Valinsky|Terry Loughlin|Bob Penny|Richie Dye|Mike Davis|Afemo Omilami|Steve Coulter|Phillip DeVona|Suzi Bass|Gordon Johnson|Tim Dabbs|Camden Dixon|Peter Mackenzie|Wanda Acuna|Erin Daniels|Jason Cairns|Vic Aviles|Keith Butler
title: Chill Factor
